subject: Soccer
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo won the FIFA World Player of the Year award Monday to complete a sweep of the game’s top individual honors for 2008. Ronaldo, a 23-year-old winger for Portugal and Manchester United, received 935 votes in a worldwide poll of national team captains and coaches. Lionel Messi, a midfielder for Barcelona and Argentina, was the runner-up. Brazil’s Marta won the women’s award.
